en.ms: The oilman's rag turns not white by washing, even through it be washed a hundred times.
en.ssk: The oily rag cannot be cleaned by merely washing it, even if it is washed a hundred times.

en.ms: By Guru's grace, remains dead in life and his nature is altered and turned and away from the world.
en.ssk: By Guru's Grace, one remains dead while yet alive; his intellect is transformed, and he becomes detached from the world.

es.sn: Por la Gracia del Guru uno muere para su ego y la corriente de la mente es canalizada.

hi.ss: हे नानक ! अगर गुरू की कृपा से मन जीवित ही मर जाय और मति (माया से) उलट जाए।
hi.sts: गुरु की कृपा से मनुष्य जीवित ही मोह-माया से विरक्त रहता है, उसका स्वभाव बदल कर सांसारिक पदार्थों की ओर से विपरीत हो जाता है।
